com.swfm.mica
Class MiSplashScreen

java.lang.Object
  com.swfm.mica.MiSplashScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
MiiActionHandler, MiiTypes
public class MiSplashScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements MiiActionHandler, MiiTypes

This class pops up a borderless window that displays the given image. The cursor is set to a Mi_WAIT_CURSOR.

Version:
%I% %G%
Author:
Michael L. Davis
